13.content:
A very long time ago, while hiding away from the military, ten year old Professor Aaron Clarkson built a functioning starship, out of the parts he found in a starship graveyard. He used the ship to escape his home planet and hid from the military by going from planet to planet, changing the appearance and upgrading the performance his ship while on them to improve his chances of not being caught. It was a full forty years before the stature of limitations ran out on his crime, and by then he had long since completed his old research project, so he started looking for a new one. He decided to research the ancient and advanced alien species known Kilocks, whose language known as “Ki” were spread on almost every planet with life. The symbols that made up the Ki language, are “Ki words”, and by using them in a specific order, they can cause effects very much like spells from old Earth fairytales, and he has written several of these Ki words on a cane that he calls “The Symbolic” that has become his weapon of choice in all combat situations.

For centuries, the Silent Sword only had Aaron on it, but eventually, it got its first two crew members. Their was one super soldier, who had been ordered to be executed along with all others, by their squads, only the super soldier squads leader survived thanks to her one loyal subordinate, while the rest of her squad was murdered, and the two spent years alone and wanted before Aaron found them and brought them onto his ship. The subordinate was a member of the Plock race, a species of giant purple humanoids with no hair, and the super soldier was sixteen year old Karen Carlson, who was kidnapped from her parents only a few months after her birth. Unfortunately, the mother had died and Karen was left with nowhere to go, so both she and her subordinate Intor Ysk stayed aboard the Silent Sword with Aaron.

Two years later, the ship got its next two additions, the twins Amy and Thomas Griffon. They were only thirteen years old, trying to run away from their abusive parents and had been hiding in the ships hull, but before Aaron had a chance to send them back, he saw their exemplary skills as pilots he agreed to let them stay aboard so long as they would be his pilots'…after he had reclaimed his stolen ship.

Yet another two years passed before the ship got more crewmembers, and for the first time they were officially hired on. Ever since he made the ship, Aaron had to run both its defense system and the warp drive at the same time, so when he hired a young couple that could take care of that for him, he had a lot more time to do his "professoring”. The couple had known each other all their lives, and have been together ever since they were ten, and not wanting to ever be separated, joined the crew to work in their respective fields. The one who was in charge of keeping the ship moving (though technically its space that moves) is the warp drive engineer Melisa Weston, and the one in charge of making sure the ship wouldn’t be blown to bits by asteroids or attackers is the defenses expert Danielle Valentine. One year later, on her eighteenth birthday, Melisa became engaged Danielle and the entire wedding was handled by Aaron, the bachelorette parties (or at least Danielle’s was a party), the ceremony (which was held on the sunrise side of a tidally locked planet), the honeymoon (on an actual moon made of honey) and just about everything else that was needed...all because he got sick from the mussy moment that was Melisa and Daniele proposing at the same time.

Three years after the wedding (and four after the Valentine’s joined) the majority of the crew began to complain about their only source of nourishment being disgustingly sweet protein packs and to stop the complaining Aaron brought the chef Natalie Woods onto the ship so she could prepare “normal” food for the rest of the ship, while he continued to consume the packs.

The last two additions were six years later, when Aaron added on an assistant named Alison Noble, who began to grow very close to him very quickly. It was also around this time when Danielle and Melisa had approached Aaron and Alison to ask him a favor, one that after many hours of the extraction, manipulation and implantation of cells resulted in Danielle being impregnated with her and Melisa’s child, then nine months later, the birth of their son, Eric.

13.title: The Silent Gain stories.

choices: While Melisa sleeps, Danielle ponders about her wife's weight gain...
Karen's condition nearly gets her killed, and can't work until she gets better.
Aaron anonces he wants to take the crew on a vaction...
131.content:
Melisa lay in bed with her eyes wide open looking up at the ceiling of her quarters, while her wife Danielle slept peacefully in the space next to her. She had been lying awake for four hours, half of that time she spent tossing and turning, but she gave up on that when she almost woke up her sleeping wife. This wasn’t the first time she’d been unable to get any sleep; it had been going on for months, ever since their son Eric was born. It wasn’t from the stress of being a mother or anything at all to do with Eric or Danielle at all. No, her insomnia was caused by the doughy, ivory orb that rested atop her once flat stomach: her new gut.

It started when Danielle first started to show, and began to worry that Melisa wouldn’t find her attractive anymore, so to ease her wife’s fears she began to put on weight with out Danielle knowing, and when their son was born, Melisa would lose the weight with her, but there was on thing that she had forgotten, something that in all those months had not once occurred to Melisa.

She had forgotten that Danielle was going to lose most of the weight when she gave birth.

Now, Danielle had nearly returned to her original lean self, with the only thing keeping her from being back at her old weight was the fat that hid away in her breast (not that she had any intent of losing it), but Melisa still had almost every pound she had gained from her plan. And while Danielle’s job involved her move heavy creates full of hyper-dense ammunition, performing maintenance on extremely hot plasma batteries and various other machinery, causing her extra weight just melt away, the majority of Melisa’s job was going from one consol to another to make sure that the whole of the ship went where it was supposed to (the stress of which didn’t contribute to her lose either), leaving her total lose being three or four pounds at most.

Her added weight quickly began to make Melisa realize how Danielle must have felt: that she was no longer attractive in her wife’s eyes, that she might not love her anymore, and just the thought of it was keeping Melisa up for weeks on end, but she was afraid to talk to Danielle about it, because it might only confirm her fears.

“Mmm,” Melisa wrenched back when she heard Danielle groan and begin to shift her position in bed, stopping when she had her arms and legs wrapped around Melisa. “Mine…”

‘Then again…’ Melisa thought as her eye lids began to grow heavy.

Hours later, after convincing Aaron to let Melisa rest, Danielle was trying to enjoy her breakfast, but her mind kept wandering back to her wife alone in bed. Though Danielle didn’t know what was troubling her, she knew something was, and hated leaving her alone when she was in pain, and while she would much rather be there to comfort her when she woke up, she still had obligations to attend to, like repairing a leaking plasma battery, then replacing the nano-field’s software with an updated, and more efficient version with a much greater deflection rate, and finally, she had to repair one of the shuttle’s rail guns before the option of being at Melisa’s side even became an option.

“Excuse me, ma’am.” Danielle’s attention was brought away from her food that she had been playing with for the last ten minutes, and up to Karen’s imposing figure standing over her.

“Y-yes,” She stammered out, not quite sure if she was going to be yelled at or hugged. She’s always found Karen hard to read, not that anyone else had an easy time with that either.

“Why don’t you go back to the engineer, I will take over your responsibility’s for the day.”

Danielle’s face lit up at the offer, but dimmed back down to her dark frown when she realized that couldn’t. “No, I can’t ask you to do that, even if I really, really…really want to.”

“Neither of us is asking, I’m ordering you to go back your quarters and tend to the needs of the engineer. You wouldn’t be able to accomplish any of your duties today anyways with her on your mind, so you may as well help in her recovery so the ship can operate at maximum capacity again.”

“Aye, aye, Commander,” Danielle said, snapping off a phony salute and flashing a bight smile, before wrapping her arms around Karen in a tight hug. “Thank you so much, Karen.”

“Just go see your wife.”

Meanwhile, in the Silent Sword’s bridge Thomas watched the ships shields drop to zero, and the hull integrity beginning to deplete immediately after as he tried to navigate through an asteroid field. He tried desperately to keep the ship from being hit, but it was impossible to dodge them all and eventually one hit the engines, disabling them and sending the ship drifting towards a giant meteor. Though, before the ship crashed, Thomas was stuck by a different massive object, two to be exact.

“YO! Gef yer foobs ow erf ma fas!” Thomas muffled out, trying to push massive objects out of his face. Unfortunately, they had too much give for him to do anything.

“Oh boo, you’re no fun!” Natalie complained, backing up some from Thomas’s pilot’s seat so that her breasts were no longer smothering him.

Thomas took deep breaths as he took his sim-helmet off, ending the imminent virtual danger to the virtual Silent Sword, got up from his seat, and then started yelling at Natalie when he caught his breath. “Yo! You could choke someone to death with those things! What if I had actually been flying the ship!? You could have killed us all with your big boobs!”

Natalie laughed as she wrapped her arms around her breast and gave them as big a hug as she could; which wasn’t much, and she didn’t even have them wrapped around their apex! “Thanks for the complements. I make sure I get a lot of dairy in my diet!”

“And silicone by the looks of them.” Thomas said as he pressed his index finger into her left breast, and watched as the digit sank in until it was completely hidden from view. “…This just got weird.”

As she broke out of her hug with herself to place her and on her trim waist, Natalie’s expression changed from giddy smile and into a devious smirk. “And yet you haven’t removed your finger yet.”

“That’s because I’m pretty sure it’s stuck!”

“Ay! Could you two please do…whatever it is you’re doing somewhere else? This is really making me sick and I’d rather not have my own vomit all terminals!” Amy yelled from her station.

“Actually, they’re all mine, so...” Thomas, Amy and Natalie looked to the entry to the bridge and saw Aaron walk in, twirling his cane with right hand.

“Y-yo, P-Pops, what-uh…what the hell are you doing here?” Thomas asked shakily after quickly removing his finger from Natalie’s breast and hiding it along with the rest of his arm behind his back, causing the massive mammary to jiggle for a good ten seconds.

A groan escaped Aaron’s mouth as he sat down at one of the terminals and propped his feet up on it. “I have no idea; I got bored and started wandering. Every one is busy or something and I can’t work on anything until Alison comes back.”

“Where is she?”

“Hell if I know, she ran off to do who knows what after my clothes got incinerated. I had just got that lab coat worn in, too.”

Amy shuddered. “If I saw Pop’s naked I would run the hell away, too!”

“Oh c’mon,” Natalie said, wrapping an arm around Aaron’s shoulder. ”He doesn’t even look old at all! The only thing that would even suggest he’s old is his hair. And if sexually ignorant psychopaths are Alison’s type she can’t do better than him.” She demonstrated by ruffling Aaron’s hair with his free hand.

“One, of course I don’t look old! Two, my hair is only gray because of stress…can you guess the fuck why? Three, the only thing I understand about that third thing was “psychopath”, and four, remove all of your limbs and extremities from my person immediately, or I will remove them from yours!”

At this point almost every one had done a little something by now: Karen had taken on Danielle’s duties while Danielle herself had gone back to her room to watch over her wife, Thomas and Natalie had sexually harassed each other, Amy had gone through Thomas’s most recant logs for anything that could be used as blackmail, Aaron had managed to install a miniature plasma cannon in his cane, that when fired would move create a pressure wave that sounded like a demon saying “fuck you” before he incinerated his clothes which made Alison feel the need to…well…she took care of that need to say the least, and Melisa had finally managed to overcome her insomnia.

The only one who had not done anything was Intor and Eric.

Though, the former was in charge of taking care of the latter when his mother’s couldn’t, but being reduced from a galactic war hero to a babysitter (a term that he was told was not literal) did not do much for the young Plock’s self-esteem.

“Little one, do you ever feel as though we do not matter?”

Placing a tiny hand Intor’s nose and giving it a squeeze, Eric then replied, “Fyidm!”

Intor shook his head and sighed. “Do your mothers know you swear like that…?”

Hours later, the ship was still moving aimlessly through space, and for once, it looks like a cycle might pass without something crazy happening...

-So while Melisa sleeps, Danielle has a chance to think about what could be worrying her wife, and thinks it has something to Melisa's weight gain, and wonders if it's even that bad...

-Until Karen's condition leaves her weak and wounded while moving crates, and most wait four months to recover before being able to work agian.

-But when Aaron announces he wants to take the crew on a vacation...well, something has to go wrong then, right?

1311.content:
When Danielle arrived back at her room, she found Melisa still asleep on her side in their bed. Not wanting to disturb her much need rest, Danielle carefully suck over to Melisa’s side of the bed, and sat down on the edge of the bed to watch her wife sleep. “I can’t believe it, but I’ve actually forgotten what you look like when you’re asleep,” She whispered. “And it’s pretty adorable…I’m really glad you’re asleep, you’d never let me live that down.” Smiling to herself, Danielle got up off Melisa’s side of the bed to lay down on hers.

Ever since Melisa started to have trouble sleeping, so did Danielle. It wouldn’t be easy for anyone to get a good nights rest when someone you cared deeply for was upset, especially when they’re lying right next to you. So sometimes in order to comfort both herself and Melisa, Danielle would basically drape herself over her wife. Which was never easy since neither of them could stay very still while they slept. Though, at that moment, Melisa was lying perfectly still, which meant Danielle could hold her however she liked. But she was also actually sleeping, so instead of risking waking her up in a death-grip-hug, she simply placed a hand on Melisa’s stomach instead, and to her surprise, it was kind of squishy.

“Look’s like someone’s getting a little chubby.” She whispered again as she started to rub small circles on her wife’s once flat stomach, the act reminding her of when Melisa would rub her stomach when she was pregnant. “I wonder…” Danielle then allowed her hand to drift slightly upwards until it moved off the mound that was Melisa’s stomach, and onto the mound that was her left breast. Once again Danielle’s thoughts were brought back to Melisa rubbing her while she was pregnant. But after about thirty seconds of her hand mindlessly resting on the soft mass, Danielle began to guide her hand back down. Only instead of along Melisa’s front, she took advantage of the fact she was sleeping on her side, and followed the curve of her wife’s back down to the curve of her wife’s ass.

A devious smile came to Danielle’s face as she began to grope the slightly more malleable orb of flesh. Melisa definitely never did this to Danielle when she was pregnant. It was then that Danielle’s thought went completely towards the time when she was pregnant. Not to when Melisa would “rub” her, but to when she felt that her size would make her unattractive to her wife. Looking back now she couldn’t believe how stupid that sounded. Then it clicked. ‘That’s probably why she’s been so upset. She got a little chubby and now she’s worried that I’m not going to think she’s attractive anymore…if this is what she felt when I started complaining she must think I’m a complete idiot.’ Danielle thought to herself.

Then she thought of something else.

“Oh my God I’m molesting my wife in her sleep!” She said aloud as she reluctantly removed her hand from Melisa’s ass.

“You were talking to yourself, too.”

Danielle froze. “Uh…g-good morning, babe, how’d you sleep?”

“Pretty well actually,” Melisa said as she sat up in bed. “Though waking up was a lot better.”

Danielle’s checks flushed red as she too readjusted into a sitting position. “Heheh, and-uh, how long ago was that?”

“Oh, not that long...” Melisa paused as she looked at her wife’s expression, and then a smug smile came to her face. “…You know, I forgot what you look like when you’re embarrassed, and it’s pretty adorable.”

“Of course you heard that…wait, does that mean you heard me say-“

“I’m really sorry,” Melisa apologized as she looked down at her stomach and placed her hands on it self-consciously. “I promise I can lose the weight. I swear I’ve been working very hard to lose it; it’s just hasn’t been enough, but I promise I’ll work harder!” Melisa was just on the brink of tears when she finished, and all over some extra weight.

“Honey, you don’t have to kill yourself over a couple extra pounds-“

“Does this look like a couple of extra pounds, Danielle?” Melisa lifted up her shirt to expose her stomach and took a hold of it with one hand and gave a tight squeeze and then a shake to demonstrate her point; and it was a point that left Danielle feeling a little tingly. “It’s no where near a couple of pounds!”

After swallowing hard Danielle asked, “Well…how much is it then?”

“…Sixty two pounds. I gained sixty two pounds in under a year…and in the last three months I’ve only managed to lose four at most, since I weigh about one fifty eight right now.” Melisa said as a single tear started to roll down her cheek.

The tingling sensation in Danielle’s stomach growing even stronger after Melisa told Danielle her weight. At least that’s where she told herself that’s where the feeling was coming from. “Honey, that’s not that much. When we got married you weighed at least ten pounds less than me, and you’re a couple inches taller! So if anything it’s more like forty. Besides…I’d rather you be a little overfed than malnourished. And the extra weight doesn’t even bother me, you still look amazing! So stop worrying that your weight can change that!”

“D-do you mean all that?”

Danielle smiled warmly at Melisa and gave her a tight hug. “Of course I do!” Danielle’s hands then started to drift lower until they met with Melisa’s ass. “I love everything about you, Sweet Cheeks.”

Melisa gave an amused laugh. “Don’t you ever stop?”

“Only when you need me to…I love you, Melisa.”

“I love you, too.” Melisa said before returning her wife’s hug.

14.content:
Cosmic Corpulence- The only band in the galaxy that is home to only a single sentient species is the Orion Band, home of the Humans. Fifty percent of all the Human colonies exist inside of it, and after the first contact war ended, the entire Human Empire was once again able to use them to their advantage.

The most privileged of all is the Tyler family, the founders of the largest and most successful corporation in the Human Empire “Cosmic Crop”. The current head of the corporation is Jennie Tyler, who inherited the position after her fathers passing. Because of her parents’ constant pruning, Jennie never had any friends her age and the closest thing she ever had to a friend were the few servants who didn’t hate her. Now, at twenty two years old, the blond is even lonelier than she was when she was a kid, with no friends or loved ones (if you could even call her parents that) and spends most of her time sitting alone in her office at her mansion or in the Tyler Towers. Until her servants and employees start to worry about her and try to cheer her up.

Galaxy’s most fattened- The most wanted, and most dangerous life form in the known galaxies, is the pirate named Alita Ubina. She commands a ship the size of a city, and employs a crew of over four hundred thousand, that work to steal from anyone with too many credits to themselves, and putting it into their own pockets, and after being injured along with her first mate and four of her favorite shipmates, she will get to enjoy the vast wealth they’ve stole-earned, while she and the others recover.

Weighty Walkers (new better plot)- Maxus Walker has traveled all through out time and space, thanks to the aid of his dimensional control device that he has hidden inside his pocket watch. On his adventures he has met and helped many people. Some of them formed great friendships with him, while others have fallen in love, and a very select few of them have been allowed to go with him on his travels, and became his "Wonder Walkers". Though sometimes they don't get along, Maxus always fixes the problem, but when he starts taking them on more relaxing adventures, a problem arises that he alone can't fix: the battle of the bulge! Granted, it’s not life threatening or even harmful, and only seems to be happening to his female friends, it’s still a problem that needs to be dealt with…but how to address it seems to be an entirely different dilemma in its self.

14.title: Gaining Galaxy stories.

141.content:
Jennie Tyler was a very beautiful, very young, and very rich woman. She had curly golden hair that reached down to just below her shoulders and parted to frame her heart shaped face, as well as keeping any hair from falling to cover her dark brown eyes. She had always been much taller than most her age, but Jennie was kept underweight by her father to make up for that “imperfection”. Similarly, she had been forced to wear many cosmetics, to keep any imperfections from showing up on her face, only now she only wore what was necessary to keep bags or dark circles from forming under her eyes from the many hard hours, sometimes even days of work; like dealing with some of the companies more illegal dealings.

“…I don’t care how much money we’ll lose, I want you to have those mines closed, and our workers and equipment out of Tollis space by the end of the month, but if you’re not up to the task I can easily find someone who is, I’ll check in on you Saturday to check your progress or lack there of.” The hologram projection on Jennie’s desk flashed out, and she sighed as she crossed out another one of her newly inherited company’s many injustices; she could just feel her father rolling over in his grave at her poor business choice each time she corrected one.

Shaking the thought from her head, Jennie turned to look out the window of her home office, and observed as the systems blue sun crept its way up into the sky, watching it for a good minute before deciding that having some alcohol in her system might make the view better; it had a way of making everything feel a little better. In fact, ever since she inherited her fathers company at seventeen, she had been using alcohol to help with the stress, and two years later, still non of the servants had questioned why the liquor cabinet in what was once her fathers office was looking a little more depleted every day, when nobody could have taken anything.

Unfortunately, before she could even open the drawer she had hidden the cabinet key, she was interrupted by one of her servants. “Good morning Mistress, I hope I’m not intruding on anything.” The servant said, bowing slightly.

“Not at all, I was just enjoying the sunrise.”

“I see, then may I fetch you something from the kitchen to enjoy while you watch?”

“Yes, something to drink would be nice, thank you. I have just finished with a long meeting that has left my throat rather dry.” She lied, what she really wanted was something to buy her time while she could make a real drink.

“Right away, Mistress,” The servant then gave another bow and left Jennie’s office, closing the door behind them.

Jennie let out a sigh. She didn’t even need any of her servants, or her chefs, or even the groundskeepers, she could have sold the mansion she called home and let them all go, but she couldn’t stand the thought of all those people left unemployed, so she kept them on, basically only taking care of each other. Yet another thought that depressed her. Jennie wished she had someone who would take care of her, one that she didn’t have to pay to smile at her, but that wasn’t the life she had, and she’d just have to deal with it.

Or at least that’s what she had convinced herself.

“Here you are, Mistress.” The servant said, setting down a tray down on desk and snapping Jennie out of her trance. “The cooks insisted that I bring you something to eat as well, they say that they wish you would have them cook for you more often.”

Jennie looked down at the tray that was loaded with breakfast foods, along with two tall glasses; one filled with a blue liquid, and the other one was filled with water and had a single a rose in it. “Well, give them my apologies; I’ve not had much of an appetite lately.”

“As long as you’re healthy and are not wasting away, Mistress, that’s all that matters. Now, is there anything else I can do for you?” The servant asked, giving Jennie a smile, which she had to admit, was one of the best fakes she’d ever seen.

“No, that will be all; you can come back in ten minute’s to collect the tray I’ll be done by then. I also might retire to my room soon; I have been up for a few days now after all.” Jennie said, trying to justify her tiredness to herself more than to the servant.

“I understand, enjoy your meal, Mistress.”

“Wait,” Jennie called out just as the servant began to leave. “Could you…please not call me Mistress anymore?” She asked, hoping that just one person would use her name, a name she’s never heard anyone use in her whole life.

“Would you rather I call you Ms. Tyler instead? Would that be better?”

Even if that was her family’s name, it wasn’t her name, and she’d rather be just a title than the family name. “…Yes…yes it would.” But she couldn’t ask to be called that after asking not to, she’d look like a fool.

Thirty minutes later, Jennie tucked herself into her bed, pulling the blanket up to her chest. She ate as much as she could of her breakfast, but about a quarter of the way through she was starting to not feel hungry and stopped, just as she had been taught. When she got comfortable she closed her eyes tight, and tried to fight to hold back her lonely tears as she wept silently, so she would not concern any passing servants or housekeepers with her sobs, eventually falling asleep.

She dreamt the same dream she had been dreaming for as long as she could remember. She was alone, in darkness, curled up in the fetal position and in intense physical, mental and emotional pain; afraid that the rest of her life was going to be like this, and so far, it looked like it was.

The next day, the dream ended as she was woken up, opening her eyes, she saw the one who saved from her nightmare. “Good morning…

…Mist-I mean…Ms. Tyler, did you sleep well?” The one who saved her from the nightmare is a maid named Marie, the one who served her breakfast the day before.

…Ms. Tyler, I hope you slept well.” Her butler Rodger has woken her up, and he’s brought her another tray of food for breakfast. (Meaning Marie didn’t.)

...it's time to rise and shine." A sizable portion of the staff has come to check up on her; they've been so worried about her lately!

(Edit: I made a mistake involving a character in this, and in another storyline, but they're gone now.)

143.content:
“Alright, we’ve got nothing to do and no one to see; what an amazing day!” Maxus beamed. He was wearing the same suit he always did, comprise of a white undershirt, a red tie, white gloves, a black jacket and black pants, with several white arrows crisscrossed all over his the jacket and pants with no pattern to see what so ever. His hair was styled in the same strange way, while most of it was short and black, there was also a long strand of white hair framing either side of his face, the left one being much thinner and reaching his shoulder, and the right one only came down to his chin, and was much thicker. “Don’t you all agree?”

“…Not really…it’s…so boring. Normally we’re in some kind of mortal danger, but this…it so boring and calm.” Shoji complained, a gentle breeze blowing by, as if nature itself was trying to agree with him.

Maxus had brought his Wonder Walkers to a forest of blue trees on an alien planet, with no intelligent life, only a few, harmless mammals, and even to someone normal, it was painfully boring.

With the brightest smile imaginable, Maxus whirled around to face his fellow Time Walkers. “That’s exactly why it’s so amazing, when does this ever happen to us? We’ve all been exposed to so much crazy, that it’s become normal. And now that I’m showing you something normal, you think its crazy! I need to slow you all down so I can start suppressing you again! I mean really what’s the point of being so…so…awetastic if there’s no one to ooo and aw at me?”

Flora smirked. “Awetastic?”

“YES, because I’m so awesome and fantastic!”

“You’re something alright.” Alec grumbled. His voice was raspy and cool, quite fitting of his cool-cowboy appearance, especially as he was leaning up against a blue tree with a plant that resembled a blue piece of hay hanging out of his mouth, and his stenson titled to cover part of his face.

“Oh, and like you’re not a piece work yourself Mr. Cool? You look ridicules with thing in you mouth and that thing on your head!” Maxus said as he walked over to Alec. He then took the plant out of Alec’s mouth as well as his hat of his head, and placed them in their respective places on his own body.

“And you think you can pull it off, even in that suit?”

Maxus laughed and tossed his left white lock. “Of course I can! Because on top of being awetastic, I’m also fablicious and coosome; that’s fabulous plus delicious, and cool plus handsome!”

Lucy always got a kick out of Maxus when he acted like that, and it was even more enjoyable when she mocked him for it. “You are the single most flamboyant man I’ve ever met.” Though, her mocking doesn’t typically work.

“Showy and dashing in a self-satisfied way, brightly colored and striking, elaborate or richly decorated, unrestrained by prevailing standards of propriety; I AM THE VERY DEFINITION OF FLAMBOYANT!!!” Maxus proclaimed with way to much enthusiasm.

Completely ignoring Maxus’s display, Olivia wondered what exactly Maxus had planed for their “Vacation of Normality” as Maxus had called it. She was probably the only one who enjoyed the idea. She really did love the adventures they went on, but at a certain point they could get overwhelming. The planet that he had brought them to was nice, but she was hoping for more of a resort type vacation, or maybe an island get away, or really anywhere that she could relax by the water, and maybe finally make a move on that special someone. Eventually, Olivia got tiered of wondering and just asked, “So what do you have in store for us Maxus?”

“I’m glad you asked!” Maxus said with a smile as he took a rolled list out from his pocket and let it come undone, and watched as the impossibly long list rolled out onto and across the blue dirt. “I’ve planed out a string of stops on the best vacation spots in the whole of the universe; from the most posh resorts, to the most exotic of tropical planets, and so much more! I'll even let and each of you choose your own special mini-vacation!”

At the back of the group, Victoria’s face flushed red and she stepped forward a bit. “O-on the mini-vacation’s…will we still be together?”

“Of course, but don’t let that influence your choice, you can pick what ever you want, and I'll force every one tho participate!”

“Uh…well…I want…to go somewhere um…roman-”

“Don’t choose yet! We haven’t finished our last adventure before we take a break! And after that we still need to do a few of the things I planed, then you can choose; hopefully by then, even the Colossal Cyan Chilipoda will scare you!”

Flora glared at Maxus, using her what-the-hell-did-you-do-now face. “…What the hell is a Colossal Cyan Chilipoda?”

“To put it simply, it’s a giant blue centipede!”

“GRAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAWWW!!!”

Several weeks later, after defeating a mile long monster, Maxus had taken his Wonder Walkers to their first stop at…
143.title: Vacation of Normality

15.content:
Download- After signing up to play a strange new game, the player finds them self inside of the world of fiction and unable to leave, but after being told why their there, and what they can do there, why would they? Oh, and in case you haven't guessed, this is a like a super fan fiction sorta thing, where you go from fictional world to fictional world, doing whatever you want to the women in them, and is a first person piece.

Eons of Powers- This story focuses on a a team of superheros know as Fate's Advanced Team, who work to save Earth from danger throughout all of its history, and serve under the goddess of time known as Fate. They live on a world that exist out side of time, along with millions of others who have been removed from times main flow, and are even immortal like them, but their powers are to weak to be place on a teams, and simply live their lives as they would on Earth, only without end.

Their are twelve main characters in this story with a possibility for even more, so to give you a taste of their wide and varied personalities, here are the four most recent additions to the team's bio's, as well as a veteran, with even more inside.

Name: Unknown.
Nickname: Daydream (or just Day).
From: Unknown.
Height: 5’9”.
Weight: 120lbs.
Hair color: Strawberry blond.
Hairstyle: Long.
Iris color: Gray.
Power(s): Dream Manipulation.
Personality and other info: Not much is known about Day’s past; only that she loves her sleep and can be easily aggravated when she doesn’t get it. Day is a great warrior as well, and loves the satisfaction of being a hero of time, but that doesn’t mean she doesn’t enjoy taking a break every once in a while. (Day is the primary character of the story and it will mostly follow her.)
Clothing: Normally something pulled out of a dream.
Love life: Love is the farthest thing on Day’s mind, but in that farthest recess of her mind, she wishes she could have a nice, attractive and loving woman she could spend immortality with.

Name: Giovanni Lombardo.
Nickname: None.
From: 15th century Italy.
Height: 5’11”.
Weight: 113lbs.
Hair color: Blond.
Hairstyle: Regular cut.
Iris color: Blue.
Power(s): Innate Capability, Energy Blast, Temporary Power Mimicry.
Personality and other info: Giovanni is a close personal friend and former apprentice of Leonardo Da Vinci, who somehow retained his memory of him after he was lifted. Giovanni is just about the nicest man you could ever meet. He is always helping people, always supportive, understanding, and kind, and he never stops smiling, some might even wonder if he can feel negative emotions.
Clothing: He always wears something in baby blue because it has a calming effect on people.
Love life: Giovanni always puts the happiness of others before his own, it would be nice if someone did the same for him, or at least thanked him for once, but he doesn’t mind if they don’t.

Name: Imiri.
Nickname: None.
From: Scythia during the Trojan War.
Height: 6’9”.
Weight: 137lbs.
Hair color: Red.
Hairstyle: Long hair.
Iris color: Green.
Power(s): Empathy, Energy Blast, Shielding, Healing Factor, Invisibility.
Personality and other info: Imiri may look like just another Amazon, but she is different. She has never been strong-willed, or a warrior, but a timid and shy woman, and she got worse when she was lifted. The team she worked with before joining Fate’s Advanced Team abused her, they used her as a meat-shield when she ran out of energy to make barriers, forced her to use her own life energy to heal them, beat her whenever she didn’t do what they said, and sexually harassed her. She had nearly died several times before Fate finally moved her to the Advanced Team, and now she’s very weary of the people she’s around, using her Empathy 24/7 to make sure she isn’t the subject of any angry feelings, and disconnecting herself from most of her own.
Clothing: Imiri has a beautiful face, a shapely body and massive double E breast that she hides beneath baggy hooded clothes so she can hide her body and face.
Love life: Despite her best efforts to keep herself from feeling like this, Imiri quickly developed a crush on a few members of the team, but won’t say who, only that one acts sweet but a little weird and another one is really loud and scares her…which doesn’t really narrow it down much.

Name: Laura Tucker.
Nickname: None.
From: 23nd century America.
Height: 5’5”.
Weight: 128lbs.
Hair color: Brown.
Hairstyle: Pixie cut.
Iris color: Brown.
Power(s): Area Detonation, Object Detonation, Self Detonation and Reforming.
Personal: Laura was an Army Second Lieutenant before she was lifted, and it’s a wonder how she obtained such a high rank, as she has always been a rather mean and sarcastic person with a short temper, and it only got worse when she was lifted, eventually shutting almost every one out…and uses her ability to blow anything up to scare away anyone who get’s too close.
Clothing: Underneath all of her clothes Laura wears an extremely thin yet durable jumpsuit like armor known as bio-suit that adapt to any situation, and changes color from red to green when it activates.
Love life: While Laura is very attractive, she is also mean, loud, sarcastic and rude, with a strong likelihood of blasting anyone to bits if they so much look at her the wrong way…

Name: Lang Fang.
Nickname: Storm Dragon.
From: Second century China.
Height: 4’7”.
Weight: 95lbs.
Hair color: Blond.
Hairstyle: Shag cut.
Iris color: Blue.
Power(s): Energy Manipulation, Transformation (Storm Dragon form), Wind Manipulation.
Personality and other info: Lang is one of the stranger members of Fate’s Advanced Team. She is obsessed with food and is always eating in her free time, calming that she needs the calories to sustain her dragon form, even though her body and its aren’t connected, though she never seems to gain any weight so she must be burning it somehow. In fact, it doesn’t seem like she has an ounce of fat on her, leaving her with a very flat body. Lang is very sensitive about her height and will beat down anyone who insults her about it, and perhaps her strangest habit is leaving out spoiled milk for a man who saved her life every Saturday night...but it is gone every Sunday morning...
Clothing: Lang's friend and team mate Sayuri is her role model and she tries to emulate her in anyway she can, including how she dresses, only wearing ‘modern clothes’ like her favorite green jacket and gray skirt.
Love life: Lang is a sweet girl but very immature, and a romantic relationship with anything other than food may be beyond her comprehension, whether it’s with a boy or a girl won’t make the concept any less confusing, though, she is rather possessive of Sayuri.

Now, pick the story you want!

(Empty slot choices will be changed to the name of the story when updated, but the story should have its summery inside, that way the right person gets the credit for the idea.)
15.title: Sci-Fy stories.

151.content:
"I’ve got nothing to do," You moaned as you sulked back in your chair. “I listened to enough music to satisfy me for the rest of my life. I’ve checked [insert social network here], been on YouTube for like, an hour an all my friends are trapped somewhere they can’t communicate with me. That was my last unread Email, it’s only four thirty, AND IT’S Still TO DANGEROUS TO GO ANYWHERE!!!”

*SLAM*

‘…Owwww…okay, taking my rage out on my desk, not a good idea,’ You thought as you lifted your head off your desk. ‘Only one thing to do: [insert search engine name here].’ You typed in "what to do when there’s nothing to do", and then waited for a result, but when you got them you were surprised. There was only one! Only one result for what to do when there’s nothing to do, that couldn’t be right! But being bored and desperate is a bad combination, and you clicked on it.

“Please insert webcam to continue!” The page asked.

“Huh, must be some kind of random chat thing…well, I have nothing else to do and I barely use that thing anyway.” You reached into a drawer of you desk, pulled out a webcams and plugged it in.

“Synchronizing…connected! Welcome, are you here to play the game?”

(Yes?) (No?)

“They call it a game…is that weird or normal? Whatever, I guess I am.” You clicked on yes and a video of you came onto the screen.

“Fantastic! Please step away from the camera until your whole body is on the screen. This picture will be used as base line for your avatar in game!”

“Oh…it’s an actual game…alright.” You got up form your chair stepped back until the webcam flashed and you went back to your chair.

“You photograph well, avatar customization will come later, first, why don’t you enter a few things about yourself? If you come across a question you don’t want to answer, simply leave it blank and don’t worry, this information will be stored safely and can only be accessed with your permission,” Several questions came onto the screen and you started filling them in. “Wow, you’re and interesting person! Just a few more and we can get started on avatar customization.”

This time only one question came onto the screen, and all you had to do was click on the choices:
151.title: It's a first person shooter!

1511.content:
You click on the boy option.

"Processing...Complete"

"Okay, looks like I'm done with the questions."

Suddenly a flashing red dot appeared on the screen.

"Please stare directly into the blinking red light." instructed the game.

You complied, staring directly into the only to suddenly find yourself standing before a slender, silver haired woman in space.

"Thank you for participating in our experimental game." said the silver woman.

"Wha-wha where am I?" you spout.

"You've been dematerialized and are currently residing in between universes. You see I represent an organization that has created a universe were one can live out their fantasies as a powerful adventurer."

"No way!"

"Indeed. You will be able to experience a multitude of varied worlds with the power that could rule every last one of them." informed the svelte woman. "Now before you're rematerialized in our world as the avatar you created, do you want me to max out all of your stats.? Think about you'd immediately be able to solve any problems but you'd miss out on the experience of growth."

You answer...
1511.title: Are you a boy?

choices: Well...Kami just stomped out the whole team on his own, that seems good...
Or maybe the end of the new recruts first day, and they gather to talk about it?

152.content:
Well, here are the rest of them, just like I said.

Name: None.
Nickname: Kitty.
From: Sahara desert.
Height: 5’6”.
Weight: 113lbs.
Hair color: Brown.
Hairstyle: Short hair.
Iris color: Blue.
Power(s): Earth Manipulation, Water Manipulation.
Personal: Kitty lived her entire life fighting to survive in the desert; it’s amazing that when she was lifted she still retained her sanity…well, aside from sometimes acting like an animal (not necessarily a cat though). Since food was never readily available for her, she often just stuffs her face when she sees food, and burns it off immediately after…she isn’t allowed to eat with the rest of the team, but despite strangeness she is still number four on the power chart.
Clothing: She doesn’t really have a style when it comes to clothing, normally just putting on the first thing she grabs…when she decides to wear any at all.
Love life: Kitty has never shown any sign of sexual desire for anyone before, though she does enjoy it when someone scratches her stomach.

Name: Sayuri Hattori.
Nickname: Shadow Kunoichi.
From: Feudal era Japan.
Height: 6’2”.
Weight: 115lbs.
Hair color: Black.
Hairstyle: Odango.
Iris color: Blue.
Power(s): Invisibility, Kuji-kiri (powers triggered by combinations of hand seals), Shadow Manipulation, Teleportation.
Personal: Sayuri and the teams strongest member came from the same time and were, and still are in some sense, mortal enemies, each responsible for the deaths of dozens of the others subordinates, but is a far cry from having the same level of power. Unlike most women, Sayuri hates having large breast, she finds that there size keeps her from moving as quiet or as fast as she would without them, so she wraps them in bandages to minimize the size…it doesn’t help much, but for their safety no-one brings them up.
Clothing: Sayuri is very fond of darker colors when it comes to what she wears, whether it is her ‘modern’ clothes or the black shinobi shozoku that she wears in combat.
Love life: What time she doesn’t spend training or on missions, she spends aggravating the teams strongest member…or eating whatever wonderful chocolate confection her best friend has made for her, but she could probably squeeze time with a lover into her schedule if she had one…she probably wouldn’t but she could.

Name: Kami-sama.
Title: Shogun Kami.
From: Feudal era Japan.
Height: 6’6”.
Weight: 140lbs.
Hair color: Gray.
Hairstyle: A giant mess.
Iris color: Whole eye is black.
Power(s): Light Manipulation, Superhuman Reflexes, Telepathy, Transformation (Demon God form).
Personal: Shortly after being lifted, Kami-sama fell into a timeless void, and was trapped there for thousands of years and changed him drastically. It took his eyesight, but gave him his power of Light Manipulation and turned almost every part of his body gray aside from eyes, which were turned jet-black…as well as drove him close to insanity. Thankfully though, Kami’s telepathy allows him to see through others eyes, and dive into the deepest parts of their minds, allowing him to be able to see what both his allies and enemies are seeing and thinking, and is an even greater fighter than when he could see. He has also lost all sense of humility, and is now very arrogant. He believes himself to be the best fighter on the team--which he is--as well as the smartest and wisest member, with power that rivals a god. His largest display of arrogance is that he not only refers to himself as God, but he also attaches sama to the end of it when talking about himself. He also uses Japanese honorifics when addressing others as well, with the sole exception of Sayuri, his (im)mortal enemy.
Clothing: The thing he wears the most is his gray Tosei-gusoku armor, but when he isn’t he often wears a gray hakama. He also always has a pair of earphones on, so that he can listen to his favorite music at any time.
Love life: I did mention he’s blind and extremely arrogant, right?

Name: Something.
Nickname: Snow White.
From: Some where and some when.
Height: 5’11”.
Weight: 118lbs.
Hair color: White.
Hairstyle: Long hair.
Iris color: Whole eye is white.
Power(s): Ice and Heat Manipulation, Short Sight.
Personal: Like Kami, Snow fell into a timeless void, gaining the ability to see certain future events several minutes before they happen, but took her ability to speak, of course it also drained her of color like Kami, but that’s less important. Despite her inability to speak Snow has a smug air and a silent cockiness about her, as well as retaining her ability to express every emotion imaginable, though, sometimes she ‘asks’ Kami to read her mind and speak for her, and in return she acts as his eyes. Over all, Snow is the second strongest behind Kami, but even then there's a massive gap in power.
Clothing: Snow only ever wears frilly white dresses.
Love life: She can’t talk but it’s still very clear what she’s feeling, like when she’s flustered, or flattered, or pleased when someone special is around…or sorry…she goes overboard on that one...and she’s never discriminated her emotional body language to just on gender before.

Name: Forgotten.
Nickname: Casanova.
From: Forgotten.
Height: 6’7”.
Weight: 132lbs.
Hair color: Green.
Hairstyle: Curtained hair.
Iris color: Green.
Power(s): Plant Manipulation.
Personal: Casanova is a Casanova, though, none of the women on the team seem to mind, and they always accept the roses he literally grows by hand, though, he has never slept with any of them, much to some of their dismay. On the team, Casanova ranks number five on the power chart, and often goes on missions alone, so that he doesn’t “endanger his precious roses”.
Clothing: Casanova only wears green suits made from his own special kind of cotton, and when questioned why he always says that his skin "can only enjoy the softest of materials" and "that only something akin to a woman’s touch will do".
Love life: The definition of Casanova is: a charming seducer of women who moves quickly from one casual relationship to another or who constantly pesters women in his pursuits.

Name: Fairly Young.
Nickname: Half Knight (and Kid).
From: 21st century Britain.
Height: 5’9”.
Weight: 117lbs.
Hair color: Black.
Hairstyle: Regular cut.
Iris color: Brown.
Power(s): Energy Blast, Superhuman Endurance, Superhuman Strength.
Personal: Fairly is nice, but some times his extreme paranoia and self-esteem issues get in the way of that. He never does anything alone to make sure nothing bad happens to just him, and he won’t eat or drink anything that hasn’t been sampled by someone else first, those duties and more are normally covered by Fairly’ best and maybe his only friend: Frank Bastard.
Clothing: Fairly has always viewed himself as painfully plain, and often dresses to stand out, even his knight armor is the extremely strange colors of blue and red.
Love life: Fairly isn’t quick to trust he’ll keep his distance at first, but when he feels he can trust someone he’ll slowly, and literally, inch closer to them. He was married before he was lifted, but she left him and now he loses it when he sees strong displays of affection…or when he’s called plain.

Name: Frank Bastard. (Pronounced Bu-star…just so we’re clear.)
Nickname: Dark Assassin.
From: 21st century France.
Height: 6’4”.
Weight: 118lbs.
Hair color: Blond.
Hairstyle: Fuaxhawk.
Iris color: Grey.
Power(s): Energy Blast, Invisibility, Superhuman Agility, Superhuman Speed.
Personal: Frank isn’t a very pleasant person. He enjoys making problems where there aren’t any, making rude jokes, and just being an over all unpleasant person. The only person that Frank is nice to is Fairly. Like Fairly, Frank has no connection to warriors of the past, only taking their personas based on their powers and equipping themselves with armor and weapons to go with them, though before being lifted Frank did love to sneak up on people.
Clothing: Unlike Fairly, Frank wears clothes that allow him to blend in, and as for armor, he hides heavy metal plates under his clothes at all times.
Love life: Frank is like Casanova…only much more lewd, blunt and sexual when it comes to picking up women, and seeing how he’s hit on all the other women on the team.

Name: Isabel Johnston.
Nickname: Gung-ho Gunslinger.
From: 17th century America.
Height: 5’7”.
Weight: 113lbs.
Hair color: Brown.
Hairstyle: French braid.
Iris color: Blue.
Power(s): Fire and Heat Manipulation.
Personal: Unlike Casanova and Frank, Isabel doesn’t discriminate the people she hits on based on their gender, just on whether or not they scare her, like Snow and Kami…and Fairly…he doesn’t scare her he just…no. She also has an odd and sometimes mean sense of humor and a short temper.
Clothing: She always wears a stenson hat, a cyan blouse, red handkerchief, blue jeans, vest, tan chaps that are the same color as her hat and vest, and brown boots with gold spurs…except when she just wears a hat, unbuttoned vest, chaps and boots.
Love life: It isn’t all too hard to get somewhere with Isabel, but in a very sex based relationship with a woman who can breathe fire at the most devastating moment, it’s best to stay on her good side.

That's every one, now let's get started already! But where should we start?
152.title: Eons of Power: character introduction.

153.content:
How about a mad scientist project that involves female test subjects that contain supernatural powers that are contagious called awakeners. The awakeners seek out a compatible "mate" to share her powers with. One "mate" can have multiple awakeners so he or she can obtain multiple powers and display a wide range of unique powers and benefits. Awakeners develop a strong attachment to their mate and strongly care for their mate and are willing to do anything for him. Awakeners are all females who look in their late teens whose genetics were designed from the most beautiful female traits. There hair and eye colors range from normal (blonde, red, etc.) to unnatural colors such as blue hair, purple eyes, eyes that are different colors, etc. Prior to finding a mate a awakener is very skinny, like bones wrapped in skin, but once she finds a mate she grows luscious curves and as you develop yours powers she grows fatter. A mate could also increase his power by fattening his awakener which can be done through a growing relationship or old fashioned feeding. The fatter an awakener is the stronger her and your power becomes. So a mate with a harem of obese awakeners is very powerful.
There are an unknown number of awakeners but there are at least 200 in the city. In an attempt to subdue the project, the scientist created sleepers to try and destroy awakeners and their mates. Sleepers are faceless humanoid bodies that are pale purple with super strength. The mates decide to seek out other mates and can either befriend each other or fight each other. If a mate kills another mate the victor claims the vanquished's awakeners. The scientists plans on killing the mates and capturing the awakeners for experimentation.
153.title: scientist project out of control

1532.content:
Lucas, a young man in his twenties, bored with his tedious life longing for something more exciting. "Man this city is a real drag I wish something would happen." Then Lucas heard some noise. He rushed over to an extremely skinny girl wearing a hospital gown who fell into some trash cans. The girl was very pretty but particularly odd looking. Her hair was blue and her eyes were yellow and she was also freakishly skinny. She grabs Lucas and beseeches him to help her and asks a slightly odd favor. "Help me get away, I sense your potential and feel you to be compatible with me, take me somewhere safe, feed me and be my mate. Hurry before they find me, I'm too thin to give you strength to fight." the blue haired girl pleaded. "Uh sure" Lucas replied picking her up and running. As Lucas held the girl he felt very strong and ran faster than he ever had nor did he feel any fatigue.
Lucas took the girl to his apartment "Here we are" said Lucas. "Thank you mate" the blue haired girl said "Do you have anything to eat I must gain." the girl asked "Yeah theres the kitchen help yourself. Take as much as you want you look like you're starving." said Lucas. The girl opened up the fridge and grabbed leftover pizza and sticks of butter and began devouring them "mmmph nomph, do you have any more food this is not nearly enough to get fat on." the girl said licking butter off her lips and fingers. "What you're trying to get fat and why do you keep calling me mate?"Lucas asked bewildered. "Oh okay i'll explain everything. You see I'm an awakener of strength. through my fat deposits I can spiritually transfer superhuman strength to you, my mate. I am actually apart of an experiment but the scientist was abusive so we all left." "We?"Lucas asked. "Yes me and hundreds of other girls. We are all gifted with the ability to enhance people who we feel a connection with our mates. We need to find them and get them to join us the more girls you have serving you and the fatter you get them, the more power you'll have. The closer you and me become the more weight I can create and with the more fat deposits the more power I can unleash in you. If our relationship becomes really close eating a stalk of celery will have the effects of a slice of cheesecake. Even though I'm skinny now I can only give you a slight increase in strength, but I'll need to fatten up to really get you strong so you can protect me and the other girls from sleepers which are monsters the scientists created after we all escaped to hunt us down. Now then... got anymore food and a bath with some new clothes would be great. "Yeah you go take a bath and help yourself to my pantry while I'll go get some more food. Oh and what do I call you?" Lucas asked. The girl responded "Zana."
Lucas returned with bags of fastfood and butter with a bikini top and and pair of shorts. "Zana, I'm Back!" Lucas shouted. "Yay masters back!" Zana gleefully said as she dried her blue hair with a towel and ran up to Lucas and gave him a hug. Zana's figure clearly had gained weight and assumed a more curvy figure. "Oh what do we have here (sniff) mmm smells good." Zana said reaching in a grabbing the food. "Yeah I told the employees that I was picking up food for a party, not that they would've believed it was for one girl who was devoted to fattening herself up while I got stronger from it." Lucas said. Lucas looked at the girl who looked back at him with a cute smile."She sure is cute" Lucas thought. After her feast they went to sleep together. In the morning Zana clearly gained weight her boobs were huge with a belly which slightly hung over her shorts and her butt was noticeably wider than the previous night. "Come on Lets go out and get you some food." Lucas said as he held her hand. "Yay" Zana said as she grabbedLucas's arm wearing her bikini top and shorts "And maybe some new clothes I don't think this will last too long." Zana said.
1532.title: Mate finds an awakener

15321.content:
On their way to the grocery store Lucas kept buying Zana foods from stands as they past, icecream, hot dogs, cinnamon buns, sandwiches, all adding to Zana's frame her boobs tightening up her bikini top and belly jiggled more with each step while fat folded over her "shrinking" shorts. People were staring not just because of a bluehaired girl but because of her skimpy little outfit on her growing body. Zana helped herself to every free sample as Lucas loaded up the cart with high calorie food from bacon to butter to cakes to beer for her beer gut. As they left the store they noticed a skinny purple haired girl sitting in a fetal position wearing a torn white dress who couldn't have weighed more than 80 pounds. info.brief_description: Sci-fi and Fantasy weight gain stories in here as well as combinations of both!
info.description:
This really should go with out saying but, here it is anyways: This is an FA (fat admirer) piece for the men and women who are lovers of large ladies. If any part of that doesn’t appeal to you, whatever, just find something that does, no one is making you read this.

*****

Hooray, it’s my birthday (when I post this that is)! I’ve been working on this for a while, and I was hoping on having more done but I have an excuse that you don’t really care about. Anyways, Inside this story you will find all kinds of stories of fantasy and sci-fi weight gain as well as ones that are sort of both (though there aren’t many of those yet), and you are welcome to add even more stories and add to existing ones, so long as you follow the rules that I put in no specific order.

1. No male weight gain.

2. No female weight loss.

3. Death is...complicated. I'd prefer it if only non-main characters die, but if you really want to kill someone important, ask me first.

4. No blueberry, inflation etc.

5. No vore of any kind.

6. The characters can only eat what is considered food, no terrain, furniture etc.

7. No toilet stuff, scat, slob or the like.

8. Sound science and theoretical should be used the most often, but if you really want to do something that isn't feel free, just make sure you make it sound legit.

9. No endings.

10. Sex is fine but don't go too far into it.

11. Inter-species breeding is only allowed for intelligent species, no sex with alien dogs or whatever.

12. Magic and science can only be used for weight gain if it is to speed it up, no instant growth.

13. Gaining on purpose is okay, just give a legitimate reason.

14. Keep in mind this is a weight gain story, so while the occasional break from it is okay as long as it still somehow contributes to the story and doesn’t last to long. I.e. someone plotting something, proclamation of love that doesn’t involve weight gain or fat (yet), something awesome and hero-y, death (keep rule three in mind though), etc.

15. No having the characters acting too OOC, but adding new layers to a character is fine as long as you aren't completely rewriting who they are.

16. Make sure that any chapters you post can be read clearly by others, and are a good size, if they aren’t, they will be deleted.

I can't think of anything else right now...but I might add more rules if I think of one or need to. If you break a rule I will have no choice but to remove/edit the chapter. If you see a chapter with a broken rule or is to short or has can not be read and should be deleted but hasn't yet, don't add to it, I might have to delete that one, too.

Now, go enjoy the story…unless you’re someone who doesn’t like sort of thing and still haven’t left. In that case…really, why are you still here? LEAVE!
